p: Okra ( Abelmoschus esculentus), originating from Africa and spreading to almost all tropical and sub-tropical regions [ 57, 58], is very common in the daily diet of Myanmar and is used to treat diabetes. Water spinach ( Ipomoea aquatic) is one of the most popular vegetables in Myanmar and is usually cooked with mushrooms, as water spinach is a powerful antidote to poisonous mushrooms, according to the informants.
